import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function CardProdcut({ element }) { const [cart, setcart] = useState([ { "title": "Apple iPhone 14 128GB Midnight", "img": "1.png", "price": 30999, "oldprice": 34099, "catid": 1, "hotoffer": "no", "id": "1" } ]) return (
{element.title} {element.price} грн {element.oldprice} грн
) }
